requiredLength.help: The minimum length of a password, in number of characters.
requiredLength.label: Required Length

requiredUniqueChars.help: The minimum number of different characters in a password.
requiredUniqueChars.label: Required Unique Characters

allowedCharacters.help: The allowed characters in unique names (users, roles, field types and contents).
allowedCharacters.label: Allowed Characters

requireConfirmedAccount.help: When enabled, users need a confirmed account (any verified contact) to sign-in.
requireConfirmedAccount.label: Require confirmed account

requireUniqueEmail.help: When enabled, user email address uniqueness will be enforced when creating or updating an user.
requireUniqueEmail.label: Require unique email address
